metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13165 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the kernel file system. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID A-31269937.

notes.Note: sbeattie> /proc/net/fib_trie leaks interface IP addresses plenty of other leaks of ip addrs exist in /proc/net/ likely not a general kernel issue S_IRUGO /proc entry added in 19baf839ff4a8daa1f2a7400897094fc18e4f5e9 net/ipv4/fib_trie.c::fib_proc_init()
